news_header: The US presidential election candidates are focusing on key states, with Kamala Harris leading in Iowa, while Donald Trump's position is unexpectedly challenged.
news_text: In the recent US presidential election campaign, candidates have concentrated on crucial states. Voters will determine the next president, with all candidates now being closely monitored by Yle’s Juri von Bonsdorff from Washington D.C. Recent developments show Kamala Harris leading in Iowa, a surprising twist as Donald Trump’s dominance in the state is questioned. Bonsdorff advises caution in interpreting these early results.
